## DateTimeSelectorControlValueAccessor class

Value accessor for getting and setting values for date time selector

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DateTimeSelectorControlValueAccessor<TDate> implements ControlValueAccessor, OnDestroy 
```
<b>Implements:</b> ControlValueAccessor, OnDestroy

|  [\_subscriptions](./datetime.datetimeselectorcontrolvalueaccessor._subscriptions.md) |  | Subscription | Subscriptions that are destroyed on directive destruction |
|  [formatted](./datetime.datetimeselectorcontrolvalueaccessor.formatted.md) |  | boolean | Indication whether value for selector is represented as formatted string value, if both 'formatted' and 'range' are set, 'range' takes precedence |
|  [range](./datetime.datetimeselectorcontrolvalueaccessor.range.md) |  | boolean | Indication whether value for selector is represented as range {<!-- -->from, to<!-- -->} |
